extendedInfo.description: â This app is ad-free and open source âLaunch your favorite apps through the Â«Home Button Swipe UpÂ» gesture.â¢ Note this works best on devices with three soft keys, like the Nexus 4 or Galaxy Nexus (i.e. devices that have virtual Â«Back/Home/Recent AppsÂ» buttons).â¢ On some devices this app opens when doing a "Long click" on the home button (e.g. the newer HTC and Sony Xperia phones).â¢ On all other devices the app might integrate into the lock screen and/or replace the standard app behind the Â«SearchÂ» button (in case your phone has one), but please note this may or may not work on your phone depending on device brand and typeâ¢ Minimum requirement is Android 4.1 Jelly Bean.â Test this app if you're looking for a simple app launcher alternative to Â«Wave LauncherÂ», Â«SwipePadÂ», Â«Smart TaskbarÂ» or Â«SidebarÂ», or if you want to replace the default Â«Google NowÂ» home button bindingSource code is hosted on Google Code:https://dynamicg-android-apps2.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/HomeButtonLauncher

reviews.title: Great idea and well executed
reviews.comment: Makes something good out of something useless. A good way to access apps or settings quickly. It would be great to see an extension to this where the user can put shortcuts directly on the semi-circular panel that appears when they hold the home button.
reviews.author: Konstantin Grachev

reviews.title: Awesome, awesome, awesome
reviews.comment: So glad to be able to reassign the home shortcut! Much more useful that just having it launch Google Now. I\'m always catching that by accident, so at least it\'ll be useful when I do. :-)
reviews.author: Anders Harrison

reviews.title: Excellent as a 2nd launcher.
reviews.comment: Set the swipe up to launch
reviews.author: randy dougherty

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Best \'launcher\' I\'ve found. Much more customisable than other launchers.
reviews.author: Mark James Rose

reviews.title: Brilliant.
reviews.comment: Excellent app. Small, simple, with all the important config options. Works exactly the way I was expecting it to. Just a little bit slow to respond. It would be great if response is faster. UPDATE: Contacts accessed thru this app crashes. Using ver 2.5.1 on Xperia Z. Although this function works fine on ver 2.4 with Galaxy Nexus. Please fix. Thanks. UPDATE: Problem resolved.
reviews.author: Allan Bernabe

reviews.title: Perfect on my xperia z!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a lot if multitasking apps out there; Pie control, toucher, swipepad, edge of screen apps and other assisstive apps. But this is by far the smoothest, fastest, consumes the fewest ram, and i don\'t accidentally activate it by mistake! A cool suggestion would be to add an option to change the color of the rocket, since it\'s not that visible on white wallpapers. That said, it\'s an amazing app.5\342\230\206!
reviews.author: Carlo F

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: It\'s the answer 2 problems of quick access/not enough screen area. Galaxy s4
reviews.author: Brian Ripp

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: Thanks so much. :))
reviews.author: Beem Keeratithananun

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Is it possible to have multiple apps on the arc created after swiping?? Also different themes/ icon packs would be awesome!
reviews.author: Matt Evans

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: I needed an app to launch voice search with a long press of the home button and change nothing else. This app is certainly capable of more than that but it performs the simple task I needed very well.
reviews.author: Nicholas Faubert

reviews.comment: Great little app
reviews.author: Philip Jones

reviews.title: Light app that works seamlessly with HTC one
reviews.comment: It works well with my HTC one on 4.2.2, best of all its ad free and very light
reviews.author: Tsao Shih-Hao

reviews.title: What should be default
reviews.comment: Google should have this in place of that silly now thing. The only major issue is that it is a bit slow to actually launch at times. Can\'t find anything else wrong with it.
reviews.author: Kris Athow

reviews.title: Marvelous
reviews.comment: Marvelous app on Samsung Note 2. One icon opens most used apps.  No ads either.  Thanks developer. ..Chris.
reviews.author: Chris Gallagher

reviews.title: Exceptional
reviews.comment: I love customizing my home screen. This app is a blast!
reviews.author: Tom Y

reviews.title: Lightweight, fast & excellent
reviews.comment: Use it to launch my favorite apps from one place. Works well for me
reviews.author: Sasz Kolomon

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: I wanted to use a widget as a launcher and this app is the closest to what I need, although some features that could be added would be full width and height adjustment, always open feature and widgets, I hope to use it as a launcher within nova, while keeping the screen blank, these features would allow me to do so
reviews.author: Akshay Jumani

reviews.title: Definitely one of the best app
reviews.comment: Probably the best app I have ever downloaded.  It lets me organize a bunch of shortcuts in one place that is easily accessible.  Suggestions to improvements if possible would be the ability to set a \"home\" tab to start instead of starting the last tab opened.  Also the ability to have other launch options on the ring.  Like one at top, on the right and on the left.  That would vastly increase functionality.
reviews.author: Kenny Li

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: IT WAS EXCELLENT AND KEEPS GETTING BETTER! THANK YOU!! I wonder if we dispense with seeing the \'rocket\', will it pop up even faster? Also I\'d like to make two requests: option to temporarily disable HBL (gets in the way with certain games), and a kill current (foreground) task function to terminate non-responding apps. Thanks! Bump ^^
reviews.author: Kevin Chan

reviews.title: Awesome app for nexus 4!
reviews.comment: Feature Request: Is it possible to have multiple launch menus triggered by different gestures from the home button?   Ex.  Right now a single rocket icon appears off the home icon,  instead have multiple icons in the semi circle around the home button.  Also,  is it possible to disable it when the phone is locked?
reviews.author: Pritesh Bodalia
